introjs-step2-intro: Here are the buttons that allow you to interact with the page
introjs-step3-intro: Click follow to stay informed about discussions on this page, or when it changes.
introjs-step4-intro: Feel free to ask questions about the topic, only those who follow the page will be notified
introjs-step5-intro: This platform is yours! Do you have a special way of doing things that you'd like to share? Don't hesitate!
introjs-step6-intro: The platform is open to everyone! We're here to talk tech, while respecting everyone's career paths! No bashing here!
